author: Daniel Ortiz-Hernandez
text:
Hello, 
I am in need of a job description for a power plant operator. I know many cities do not operate their own power plant, let alone one with diesel turbines, but I'm hoping someone out there does or has something similar. We have a need to hire some additional staff for our power plant but lack a job description since the last time a person was hired for the position was nearly two decades ago. I would greatly appreciate any help. 
Thanks.
Daniel Ortiz
City Administrator
City of Kimball
Phone:  308.235.3639
Email: DOrtiz@kimballne.org
title: Power Plant Operator Jobe Description
